EmailTemplate.name: March Emails 2019.PCF 2.5 - What's New 3-5-19
EmailTemplate.subject: 4/10/19 Webinar - Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.5: A First Look
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.5: A First Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-10-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-5-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=pcf2.5-firstlook&utm_term=q219]]>, on April 10, 2019.
Join Dan Baskette and Jared Ruckle for a first look at Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) 2.5 capabilities with demos and expert Q&A. Attend this session and learn how you can:
- Accelerate developer productivity with new capabilities that give you more control over your applications.
- Improve operator efficiency and simplify administration of applications at scale.
- Reduce risk by keeping your your platform in a secure, healthy state.
Plus so much more!
Register now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-10-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-5-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=pcf2.5-firstlook&utm_term=q219]]> and be the first to get your eyes on PCF 2.5!
Presenters: Dan Baskette, Director, Technical Marketing Jared Ruckle, Director, Product Marketing
Date: Wednesday, April 10, 2019 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-10-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-5-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=pcf2.5-firstlook&utm_term=q219]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
